title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: When selecting SWT.MULTI option in the ControlExampleText, the software produces a beeping sound. This behavior is unexpected and does not seem to be intended.
OB: After selecting SWT.MULTI, clicking on other buttons within the software also triggers the beeping sound.
EB: Selecting SWT.MULTI should not result in any sound being produced.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the software. 
2. Navigate to the ControlExampleText section. 
3. Select the SWT.MULTI option. 
4. Click on other buttons within the software.
